abstract.p: This document, number nineteen in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 19 according to Bausi's reference). The document is attested twice, once is it followed immediately by CCR 20 . Further, this document was apparently copiedь with some insignitificant changes into a small quire, which contains a number of documents likely copied from older documents (originals?) in the sixteenth century.
